content.html: in Norway, "up and not crying" is a not uncommon response to "how's it going" type questions, and I feel like that's a very reasonable standard to hold oneself to especially nowadays

content.html: In case you missed it yesterday (there was a "game awardz" thing) Emerald Woods, the free no-combat, #farming, exploration and creature collecting #roguelike, now has Graphics! content.html:
Today, #TurnBasedFest starts on Steam, so I updated our store page with a couple of screenshots, fresh out of unity!

Player characters now have proper attack animations (think Darkest Dungeon), which makes such a difference and was long overdue!

https://bit.ly/3gdWnrB

#gamedev #indiedev #roguelike #turnbased #madewithunity
